metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3265 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:Server: Packaging). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.53 andearlier, 5.6.34 and earlier and 5.7.16 and earlier. Difficult to exploitvulnerability allows high privileged attacker with logon to theinfrastructure where MySQL Server executes to compromise MySQL Server.Successful attacks require human interaction from a person other than theattacker. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result inunauthorized access to critical data or complete access to all MySQL Serveraccessible data and unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequentlyrepeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS v3.0 Base Score 5.6(Confidentiality and Availability impacts).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3265` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-common - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1

mariadb-common - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.17-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mariadb-10.0 package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '10.0.29-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-server-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
